item.title: Google Acquires Startup Wiz for $32B to Make ‘Cybersecurity More Accessible And Simpler’
item.description:
Google’s agreement to buy cloud security startup Wiz will face antitrust scrutiny amid Alphabet’s ongoing legal battles.

item.title: IBM Completes HashiCorp Acquisition for $6.4 Billion, Expanding Hybrid Cloud Offerings
item.description:
HashiCorp brings infrastructure provisioning that will help some IBM products run more smoothly in hybrid cloud environments.
